title: Redesign with trendy 2026 aesthetic using bold gradients, glassmorphism, and modern animations

requirements.text: Update the color palette throughout the application to use bold, vibrant gradients with modern 2026 aesthetics, replacing the current deep blue and teal scheme with trendy gradient combinations that feel fresh and forward-thinking while maintaining professional credibility for a financial service

quotes: create a ableinternetpayroll should look more trendy 2026 design

acceptanceCriteria: Application uses modern gradient color schemes throughout
Colors feel contemporary and forward-thinking while remaining professional
Gradients are applied to backgrounds, cards, and UI elements
Color palette is consistent across all pages and components

requirements.text: Apply glassmorphism effects to card components, feature sections, and UI elements throughout the site, including frosted glass backgrounds with blur effects, subtle transparency, and light border treatments
acceptanceCriteria: FeatureCard components use glassmorphism styling with backdrop blur
Section backgrounds incorporate frosted glass effects where appropriate
Glassmorphic elements have subtle borders and transparency
Effects are performant and visually consistent

requirements.text: Add smooth scroll-triggered animations to all major sections (Hero, FeaturesOverview, MobileAccessSection, ComplianceSection) that animate elements into view as users scroll down the page
acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade in or slide in when they enter the viewport
Animations are smooth and performant
Animation timing feels natural and not jarring
Elements animate sequentially for visual interest

requirements.text: Update typography styling with modern 2026 trends including larger, bolder headings, generous letter spacing, and contemporary font weight combinations that enhance readability while feeling cutting-edge
acceptanceCriteria: Heading sizes are increased with bold, impactful typography
Letter spacing and line height are optimized for modern aesthetics
Font weight hierarchy is clear and contemporary
Typography maintains excellent readability

requirements.text: Add interactive hover effects and micro-animations to buttons, cards, and interactive elements including smooth transitions, scale effects, and visual feedback that enhance user engagement
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons have smooth hover effects with scale or glow transitions
Feature cards respond to hover with elevation or scale changes
All interactive elements provide clear visual feedback
Animations are subtle and enhance rather than distract

requirements.text: Redesign the Hero section with a more dramatic, immersive visual treatment using large gradients, dynamic background elements, and modern layout that captures attention while maintaining the existing messaging and CTA structure
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section has a bold, eye-catching gradient background
Layout feels spacious and contemporary
Existing headline and CTAs are preserved but styled modernly
Trust indicators are integrated with the new design

requirements.text: Update all existing content sections to maintain their information and messaging while applying the new 2026 visual design system, ensuring consistent modern aesthetics across the entire application

quotes: keeping all the existing payroll features and information

acceptanceCriteria: All text content remains identical to current version
Feature descriptions and messaging are unchanged
Section structure and information hierarchy is preserved
New visual styling is applied uniformly across all sections

constraints: Preserve all existing text content and messaging from the current site
Maintain the same section structure and information hierarchy
Keep all current payroll features and feature descriptions intact
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, and ui components directory
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond visual redesign
Changing the content or messaging of existing sections
Modifying backend logic or data structures
Adding new sections or removing existing ones
